resources.name: Refresh token
resources.description:
Refresh your auth token with your refresh token

<!-- RESPONSE -->

{
    "access_token": "111111111111111111111111111111111111111",
    "token_type": "Bearer",
    "expires_in": 5184000,
    "refresh_token": "2222222222222222222222222222222222222222",
    "scope": "mobile"
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: Login
resources.description:
Get your token and refresh token by loging in using your email and password

<!-- RESPONSE -->

{
    "access_token": "111111111111111111111111111111111111111",
    "token_type": "Bearer",
    "expires_in": 5184000,
    "refresh_token": "2222222222222222222222222222222222222222",
    "scope": "mobile"
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: Get user plants
resources.description:
Retrieves all your plants connected to your account

<!-- RESPONSE -->

{
  "gardens": [
    {
      "id": 123,
      "garden_name": "Home",
      "origin_path": null,
      "thumb_path": null,
      "mac_address": null
    }
  ],
  "plants": [
    {
      "id": 12,
      "nickname": "Ficus benjamina 1",
      "scientific_name": "Ficus benjamina",
      "status": 2,
      "plant_id": 201,
      "family_id": null,
      "wifi_status": 1,
      "thumb_path": "<url>",
      "origin_path": "<url>",
      "plant_thumb_path": "<url>",
      "plant_origin_path": "<url>",
      "received_data_at": "2023-01-00 10:10:00",
      "temperature_optimal_hours": 22,
      "light_optimal_hours": 0,
      "temperature_status": 2,
      "light_status": 1,
      "moisture_status": 3,
      "salinity_status": 2,
      "garden": {
        "id": 123
      },
      "sensor": {
        "id": "AA:AA:AA:2B:AF:F4",
        "has_sensor": true,
        "status": 1,
        "uuid_android": null,
        "uuid_ios": "4AAAAAA6F-0457-3233-8A43-032B5377E763",
        "version": "0.30.0",
        "is_battery_low": false,
        "received_data_at": "2023-01-01 10:10:00"
      },
      "hub": {
        "id": 123,
        "hub_id": "AA:AA:AA:27:7D:6A",
        "status": 1,
        "received_data_at": "2023-01-01 01:10:01",
        "reached_hub_at": "2023-01-01 10:10:01"
      }
    }
  ]
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: User account
resources.description:
Retrieve your profile data

<!-- RESPONSE -->

{
	"profileData": {
		"id": 110,
		"uuid": "",
		"email": "john@doe.com",
		"status": 1,
		"lang": "en",
		"username": "John Doe",
		"birth_date": "01-01-1970",
		"plants_knowledge": 1,
		"plants_owned": 1,
		"city": "Gardenville",
		"country": "Botanica",
		"temperature_unit": 1,
		"fb_id": null,
		"google_id": null,
		"apple_id": null
	}
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: Get plant
Get measurements
resources.description:
Retrieve plant measurements

<!-- RESPONSE -->

{
  "measurements": [
    {
      "light": 1,
      "temperature": 18,
      "soil_moisture": 61,
      "soil_moisture_anomaly": false,

      "soil_fertility_anomaly": false,
      "date_utc": "2023-01-01 01:00:00"
    }
